metadata.Title: CVE-2023-48161 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability in GifLib Project GifLib v.5.2.1 allows a local attacker to obtain sensitive information via the DumpSCreen2RGB function in gif2rgb.c

criterions.comment: giflib: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
